department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Ngan MacDonald has over 7 years of experience in business intelligence and over 12 years in information systems. Prior to entering the technology field, Ngan worked in Human Resources Management. The combination of business management and information technology experience has given Ngan a unique insight into the information needs of the business user. <br><br>Ngan holds an M.S. in Information Systems from DePaul University and a B.S. in Communications from Northwestern University. She has worked has worked as a business intelligence consultant for a range of companies including manufacturing, pharmaceutical, telecommunications and healthcare. Most recently, Ngan is employed as manager of regulatory information solutions at Health Care Service Corporation. <br>
